Terrorsaur/Quickstrike:




Terrorsaur shrugged. He might as well find out what this was about. 
He could always turn around. He trotted after Megatron.




Quickstrike jolted as he heard the explosion. All his senses went up. 
He poked his head from the turn of a corridor. His olfactory sensors 
were going crazy. He was smelling Megatron. He groaned and ran after 
the smell. He smelt Maximals while he was at it. He powered up after 
that. He felt a fight comming on, and it was exciting him. 

He opened up his comm-link to the others in the base. "Any of y'all 
hear that?"
